API name: Weatherbit Ag-Weather Forecast REST API v2.0
Description: Weatherbit Ag-Weather Forecast API returns an 8-day forecast for weather data specific to the Agriculture industry. It allows you to retrieve predictions for soil temperature, soil moisture, evapotranspiration, and more. The supported response format is JSON with an API Key required for authentication.Weatherbit.io is historical weather, current weather, and forecasts APIs.
